channel.title: PLZ Help NO CLIENT works anymore!
channel.description:
OMG plz help me on any client i go on this error keeps coming up, i even go and download a different client of the download section and those dont work either!!!! Heres the error i get when i open up run: [img]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k421/lesterknome/Errorr-1.jpg[/img]
I checked and my server is still working, whoever helps can get my new client, Silabsoft and Beyond (note: i still have to find the drgon visage and boxed sets), When it comes out. Plz help!!!

item.title: PLZ Help NO CLIENT works anymore!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:12, topic:231134”][quote author=gh0st1 link=topic=304400.msg2444677#msg2444677 date=1221665809]
@echo on
java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI 30 0 highmem members 32
pause

pres right click on run server.bat press edit delete and add this @echo on
java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI 30 0 highmem members 32
pause good luck
[/quote]

I love you.[/quote]
Umm i love you too?

And also dragmagic i dont have a egui folder in my client, it’s gui, i think thats why but even when there is a egui the client won’t work…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2008, 11:29:24 am[/size][hr]Hey Moparscaper dude it worked, my rewards for you will be A I will let you have your client on my site[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2008, 11:30:43 am[/size][hr]it will be something.fight4ever.com, k?

Read full topic

item.title: PLZ Help NO CLIENT works anymore!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“barfinmonkey, post:3, topic:231134”]ready and good to go ! :d

@echo Off echo Loading Client... java -Xmx500m -cp .;./Class; EGUI echo Client LOADED! pause i hadt that exact error, made this cheap ass batch file, it will definitely work.[/quote]
Fixed up your post mate.
